title: Conclusion and Bibliography
description: So, how smart animals are? Here is my conclusion and all the source that i used for answer.

title: Article N°8 : How to tell if your dog is a genius
description: description of a study that we can try with our dog but is it able to do this ? Of course it depend of the dog's race !

title: Article N°7 : Birds that play with others have the biggest brains - and the same may go for humans
description: A study show a very clear differences in relative brain mass when birds showing play behaviour

title: Article N°6 : Clever cuttlefish show advanced self-control, like chimps and crows
description: Cuttlefish with self-control? Yes, it's on of his many abilities. A theam of researcher test the self-control of cuttlefish by adapting a famous psychology experiment used to test toddlers’ willpower.

title: Article N°5 : Pigs can play video games scientists discover
description: You don't dream : pigs can play video games ! They  can use a digital screen and joystick.

title: Zooplanckton graphic description
description: Zooplankton dataset analysis and graphic description

title: Article N°4 : Intelligence of rats and mice
description: let's see how much rats and mice are intelligent.

title: Article N°2 : Links between primate brain size and their intelligence
description: research team compare the cognitive abilities of different species of primate and the size of their brain.

title: Article N°3 : Dolphins learn to use tools
description: Dolphins teaching each other a new way to use a tool to hunt. It's a big discover because social learning is rare in nature.

title: Article N°1 : Does animal behavior predict an earthquake?
description: Some animals change their behavior just before seismic events, researchers try to make a link between these unusual animal behavior and earthquake.
